Source.Name: qtractor
Source.Summary: Qtractor for Linux is an Audio/MIDI multi-track sequencer application written in C++ with the Qt4 framework.
Source.Description: Target platform is Linux, where the Jack Audio Connection Kit (JACK) for audio, and the Advanced Linux Sound Architecture (ALSA) for MIDI, are the main infrastructures to evolve as a fairly-featured Linux desktop audio workstation GUI, specially dedicated to the personal home-studio.
